summary: Whirlwind sprint now cuts through your enemies just like the samurai shows.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]cgClkkobch4[/youtube]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Whirlwind sprint now does area of effect damage to enemies when shouted, Making it simulate them taking damage, A shadowstep if you will.
Enemies will also have a darkness effect, But by the time you dash through them you might not notice it.
Simulates when you pass through enemies, They take damage because of it. Making whirlwind sprint much more valuable.
There is however an exploit of coarse, Bethesda did not program a line based area attack, So I did my best by making the area line of sight only.
Even if you do choose to use this exploit, The cooldowns for whirlwind sprint remain 20,25, and 35.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Shout 1
30 area 60 damage  A small line of fows, Lets say a small bridge.

Shout 2
90 area 60 damage  An average line of fows, Medium sized bridge.

Shout 3 110 area 60 damage  A very big line of enemies, Were talking yards.

I left the damage 60 and upped the area each shout to compensate for how many enemies this would hit at once, Also i did testing on the mine before riverwood with the enemy on the opposit side of the bridge, This should be pretty accurate.
author: thelawfull
